channel.title: CVE Feed for OTRS AG -- OTRSCIsInCustomerFrontend

item.title: CVE-2021-21437|2024-09-16T20:53:12.704Z -- otrs%20ag -- otrscisincustomerfrontend
item.description: Agents are able to see linked Config Items without permissions, which are defined in General Catalog. This issue affects: OTRSCIsInCustomerFrontend 7.0.15 and prior versions, ITSMConfigurationManagement 7.0.24 and prior versions
